Desc.entry: A specialist domestic abuse delivery organisation promoting a more sensitive, consistent and co-ordinated response to women and children and others experiencing domestic abuse. Manages the Domestic Abuse Floating Support Service (see separate entry), the Independent Domestic Violence Advocacy Service, and organises a self-help group for women who have experienced domestic abuse. Administers the Womens No Recourse Fund which provides help to women suffering domestic abuse that have no recourse to public benefits or funds. Has a strategic role, distributes information resources and co-ordinates training and working groups. Has a resource library. Holds an event to mark International Day to End Violence Against Women in November. Self or any referral. Company limited by guarantee no 4405173.
